mapper.select: select * from project where 1=1 and code = #{code}
select * from project order by department;
mapper.insert: insert into project (code, currrentTask, decorationProgress, saleConfirm, end, projectName, projectTelephone, projectType, mainProject, groupID, sales, department, itemId, createName, createTime, updateName, updateTime ) values ( #{code}, #{currrentTask}, #{decorationProgress}, #{saleConfirm}, #{end}, #{projectName}, #{projectTelephone}, #{projectType}, #{mainProject}, #{groupID}, #{sales}, #{department}, #{itemId}, #{createName}, NOW(), #{updateName}, NOW() )
